General_Description: '''A Curious Request''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Drawn by the cries of help, Kassandra infiltrated the [[Ischagoras Military Camp]], and found an elderly [[Ide|lady]] tied up within.
Section_Dialogue:
During her time in [[Makedonia]], Kassandra drew near the Ischagoras Military Camp. She infiltrated the camp and began dispatching the guards within, then overheard a woman tied up in a nearby tent out to her for help. *'''Civilian:''' ''I'm over here! I need your help breaking out!'' Kassandra made quick work of the remaining guards and untied the woman. *'''Civilian:''' ''Let's get the fuck out of here!'' Kassandra escorted the woman to safety. *'''Civilian:''' ''[[Mercenary|Misthios]], thank you! Those fuckers thought they could hold me, but they just didn't understand. No prison can hold me. Nobody can hold me down. Not even that stupid [[Order of the Ancients|Order]]...'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Right...'' *'''Civilian:''' ''They were ruining my favorite wine-drinking view with all their mercenaries. No one wants to see trashy mercenaries around their homes.
No offense.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''None taken.'' *'''Civilian:''' ''You know, I overheard them say they had brought another three mercenaries here. Can you believe that?'' (Accept – "I can kill some mercenaries for you.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help get your view back.'' *'''Civilian:''' ''Fuck yes! There's three mercenaries, remember. Once they're gone, I'd love to share a cup of wine with you in my spot. Even if you are a misthios yourself.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'd like that.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra freed Ide and escorted her out of the camp to safety. The old woman requested her help in eliminating several mercenaries.
